name: Blueberry Tea Cocktail
description: A soothing and warm tea cocktail made with amaretto and Grand Marnier, reminiscent of blueberries!

ingredients.name: Cointreau or Grand Marnier® orange liqueur
Crème de la Crème Tea or tea of your choice

preparation: Pour a 1-oz shot of each liqueur into each preheated glass.
Garnish with orange slices and a cinnamon stick, if desired.
